direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve the head of the queue without removing it.
Both methods retrieve elements from the queue, but poll() removes the element.
Both methods interact with the queue but perform different operations (offer adds an element, peek retrieves without removing).
Both methods interact with the head of the queue, but remove() also removes the element.
Both methods involve operations on a queue, though transformedQueue initializes and transforms the queue.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializes and transforms the queue, setting up the state for peek() to operate on.
Adds elements to the queue, which can be peeked later.
Both methods retrieve the head of the queue, making element() useful for assertions after peek().
